mapper.insert: UPDATE shop_info i left join shop_commodity_info c ON i.shop_id = c.shop_id SET i.upload_commodity_balance = i.upload_commodity_balance + 1 WHERE c.commodity_id = #{commodityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_info i SET i.score = ( SELECT AVG(c.score) FROM shop_commodity_evaluate c WHERE c.item_id = i.shop_id )
mapper.select: select * FROM shop_info i where i.category_id = (select ct.category_id from shop_category c left join shop_category_top ct ON c.category_pid = ct.category_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categorySecId});
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop_info where uid=#{uid} and status = 0
